description:
Your Private Sanctum for AI

Run & interact with full-featured open-source LLMs locally on your device. Your data is encrypted, secure, and never leaves your Sanctum.
Sanctum now supports audio-to-text conversion right on your device.
Audio-to-Text: Local Audio Transcription
- Straightforward Setup: Download a Whisper model, upload your audio file, and you’re good to go.
- Tailored to Your Device: Choose from different Whisper models depending on your compute power.
- Real-Time Synced Playback: As you listen to the audio, the text in the transcript is highlighted.
- Search: Find the exact moment without scrubbing through the audio manually.
- Broad compatibility: Whether it’s a Zoom call, a song, or a private recording, Sanctum handles it all.
- Offline, Local and Secure: Transcripts are fully exportable, and everything stays on your local machine.
Storage Usage Overview
You can now keep tabs on how much storage Sanctum is using.
Font Size Adjustment
Zoom in or out to adjust the font size for a more comfortable view.
Bug Fixes
We’ve updated PowerPoint (.pptx) reader to resolve some issues experienced with uploading these files.
